+ pub fn read_openai_api_key_from_env() -&gt; Option&lt;String&gt; {
+     env::var(OPENAI_API_KEY_ENV_VAR)

+         .map(|value| value.trim().to_string())

+ }

+     enable_codex_api_key_env: bool,

+     // ğŸ¥‡ 1st Priority: CODEX_API_KEY environment variable

+     let storage = create_auth_storage(codex_home.to_path_buf(), auth_credentials_store_mode);
+     let auth_dot_json = match storage.load()? {
+         Some(auth) =&gt; auth,
+         None =&gt; return Ok(None),
+     };

+     // ğŸ¥‰ 3rd Priority: OAuth tokens
+     if let Some(api_key) = &amp;auth_json_api_key {

+     }
+ 
+     // Fallback to ChatGPT OAuth mode
+     Ok(Some(CodexAuth { ... }))
+ }

+ /// Get API key from environment or config
+ pub fn get_api_key(&amp;self) -&gt; Result&lt;String&gt; {
+     // Check environment variables in priority order
+     if let Ok(key) = std::env::var(&quot;GEMINI_API_KEY&quot;) {
+         return Ok(key);
+     }
+     
+     if let Ok(key) = std::env::var(&quot;GOOGLE_AI_STUDIO_API_KEY&quot;) {

+

+ # ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°ã®ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ã‚¹
+ function Get-EnvVariables {
+     param([string]$Path)
+     
+     $envVars = @()
+     $lineNumber = 0
+     
+     Get-Content $Path | ForEach-Object {
+         $lineNumber++
+         $line = $_.Trim()
+         
+         # ç©ºè¡Œã¨ã‚³ãƒ¡ãƒ³ãƒˆè¡Œã‚’ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—
+         if ([string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($line) -or $line.StartsWith(&quot;#&quot;)) {
+             return
+         }
+         
+         # KEY=VALUE å½¢å¼ã‚’ãƒ‘ãƒ¼ã‚¹
+         if ($line -match &#39;^([^=]+)=(.*)$&#39;) {
+             $key = $matches[1].Trim()
+             $value = $matches[2].Trim()
+             
+             # å€¤ãŒç©ºã§ãªã„å ´åˆã®ã¿è¿½åŠ 
+             if (-not [string]::IsNullOrWhiteSpace($value)) {
+                 $envVars += @{
+                     Key = $key
+                     Value = $value
+                     LineNumber = $lineNumber
+                 }
+                 
+                 if ($Verbose) {
+                     $maskedValue = if ($value.Length -gt 10) {
+                         $value.Substring(0, 10) + &quot;...&quot; + &quot;($($value.Length) chars)&quot;
+                     } else {
+                         &quot;***&quot;
+                     }
+                     Write-ColorOutput &quot;  ğŸ“ Line $lineNumber : $key = $maskedValue&quot; -Color Gray
+                 }
+             }
+         }
+         else {
+             Write-ColorOutput &quot;  âš ï¸  Line $lineNumber : ç„¡åŠ¹ãªå½¢å¼ã‚’ã‚¹ã‚­ãƒƒãƒ—: $line&quot; -Color Yellow
+         }
+     }
+     
+     return $envVars
+ }

+ function Set-EnvVariables {
+     param(
+         [array]$Variables,
+         [bool]$IsPermanent
+     )
+     
+     $successCount = 0
+     $failCount = 0
+     
+     foreach ($var in $Variables) {
+         try {
+             if ($IsPermanent) {
+                 # ã‚·ã‚¹ãƒ†ãƒ ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°ã¨ã—ã¦æ°¸ç¶šåŒ–
+                 [System.Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable(
+                     $var.Key, 
+                     $var.Value, 
+                     [System.EnvironmentVariableTarget]::User
+                 )
+                 
+                 if ($Verbose) {
+                     Write-ColorOutput &quot;  ğŸ’¾ [æ°¸ç¶š] $($var.Key)&quot; -Color Green
+                 }
+             }
+             else {
+                 # ç¾åœ¨ã®ã‚»ãƒƒã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã®ã¿
+                 [System.Environment]::SetEnvironmentVariable(
+                     $var.Key, 
+                     $var.Value, 
+                     [System.EnvironmentVariableTarget]::Process
+                 )
+                 
+                 if ($Verbose) {
+                     Write-ColorOutput &quot;  âœ… [ä¸€æ™‚] $($var.Key)&quot; -Color Green
+                 }
+             }
+             
+             $successCount++
+         }
+         catch {
+             Write-ColorOutput &quot;  âŒ ã‚¨ãƒ©ãƒ¼: $($var.Key) ã®è¨­å®šã«å¤±æ•—ã—ã¾ã—ãŸ&quot; -Color Red
+             Write-ColorOutput &quot;     è©³ç´°: $($_.Exception.Message)&quot; -Color Red
+             $failCount++
+         }
+     }
+     
+     return @{
+         Success = $successCount
+         Failed = $failCount
+     }
+ }

+ # AES-256-GCMã§æš—å·åŒ–
+ # .env.encrypted ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ç”Ÿæˆ
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;
+ 
+ ### 3. ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°ã®å·®åˆ†ç®¡ç†
+ 
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;powershell
+ # å®Ÿè£…ä¾‹ï¼ˆæœªå®Ÿè£…ï¼‰
+ .\zapabob\scripts\diff-env.ps1 .env.development .env.production
+ 
+ # 2ã¤ã®.envãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã®å·®åˆ†ã‚’è¡¨ç¤º
+ # ä¸è¶³ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ç’°å¢ƒå¤‰æ•°ã‚’è­¦å‘Š
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;

+ ### 4. dotenvè‡ªå‹•èª­ã¿è¾¼ã¿
+ 
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;rust
+ // å®Ÿè£…ä¾‹ï¼ˆæœªå®Ÿè£…ï¼‰
+ // codex-rs/core/src/config/mod.rs
+ 
+ pub fn load_dotenv(codex_home: &amp;Path) -&gt; std::io::Result&lt;()&gt; {
+     use std::fs::File;
+     use std::io::{BufRead, BufReader};
+     
+     let env_file = codex_home.join(&quot;.env&quot;);
+     if !env_file.exists() {
+         return Ok(());
+     }
+     
+     let file = File::open(&amp;env_file)?;
+     let reader = BufReader::new(file);
+     
+     for line in reader.lines() {
+         let line = line?;
+         let line = line.trim();
+         
+         // Skip comments and empty lines
+         if line.is_empty() || line.starts_with(&#39;#&#39;) {
+             continue;
+         }
+         
+         // Parse KEY=VALUE
+         if let Some((key, value)) = line.split_once(&#39;=&#39;) {
+             std::env::set_var(key.trim(), value.trim());
+         }
+     }
+     
+     Ok(())
+ }
+ &#96;&#96;&#96;
+ 
+ ---
